LocaleData.item-long-sword-description: Longswords are a common weapon for adventurers
LocaleData.class-warrior-description: Warriors use raw power to overwhelm their foes
LocaleData.item-short-sword-description: For those who dont quite fancy a long sword
LocaleData.item-leather-chest-description: Provides basic protection for the wearer
LocaleData.item-leather-pants-description: Provides basic protection for the wearer
LocaleData.class-rogue-description: Rogues keep to the shadows and unleash powerful attacks at the cost of defense
LocaleData.class-priest-description: Priests channel light magic to heal and smite
LocaleData.class-mage-description: Mages make use of the elements to destroy their foes
LocaleData.race-human-description: Humans are the most common of the races with an affinity to blades
LocaleData.race-dwarf-description: Dwarves are hardy and strong giving them an affinity to larger blunt weapons
LocaleData.race-orc-description: Orcs are the largest of the common races and seek to overpower their foes with raw strength
LocaleData.race-elf-description: Elves have an affinity for magic giving them bonuses to any classes aligned with magical abilities
LocaleData.basic-bandits-description: There have been reports of bandits in nearby areas: please remove them
LocaleData.basic-slimes-description: There is simply too much slime infesting nearby areas: please remove it
